vip.title: Godmode Ambassador Access
vip.cta_hint: App Store will open to activate your access
vip.cta_subtitle: Copies code and opens App Store redemption.
vip.ambassador_body_2: This access isn't sent at random.
vip.ambassador_body_3: You're receiving it because we believe you align with what Godmode stands for and how we understand training, consistency, and long-term thinking.
vip.ambassador_body_4: We'd love for you to try the app with 1 full year of access, use it your way, and share your honest feedback with us.
vip.ambassador_body_passes: You also get {count} one-month passes to share with anyone you choose — friends, people close to you, or followers you think would genuinely benefit from it.

index.title: Godmode - AI Fitness Companion
index.description: Transform your fitness journey with Godmode. AI-powered workouts, scientific progress tracking with the Godmode Algorithm, and personalized training plans.
index.hero_subtitle: Transform your fitness journey with AI-powered training. Scientific progress tracking. Personalized workouts. Real results.
index.cutting_edge: Cutting-edge AI meets proven fitness science.
index.ai_workouts_desc: Personalized plans tailored to your goals, equipment, and fitness level. The AI learns from every session.
index.smart_tracking_desc: Detailed analytics using the Godmode Algorithm to measure true strength, not just weight lifted.
index.adaptive_training_desc: Your workouts evolve with you. Intensity, volume, and exercises adjust as you progress.
index.problem_desc: Most fitness apps use a simplistic approach: they track the heaviest weight you touched that day. This is flawed. It ignores volume, rep ranges, and consistency. It rewards ego-lifting rather than working capacity.
index.solution_desc: Godmode uses a deterministic approach to tracking. We don't guess; we calculate. We utilize an Aggregate Estimated 1-Rep Max (e1RM) to generate a single, stable performance score for every session.
index.formula_vars: where w = weight lifted, r = repetitions
index.step1_desc: The system calculates the e1RM for every valid set you complete.
index.step2_desc: We sort your sets and select the top 3 best performing sets.
index.step3_desc: We average those three scores for your final data point.
index.why_works_desc: Averaging the top 3 sets removes volatility. If you hit a PR on set 1 but burn out on the rest, your score reflects that drop. It rewards consistent performance across multiple working sets—the exact type of training required for hypertrophy.
index.graph_caption: "If the line goes up, your muscle has no choice but to grow."
index.short_term_desc: 1 Week – 3 Months. Line chart of individual session scores. Track workout-to-workout progression.
index.medium_term_desc: 6 Months – 1 Year. Bar chart of monthly max. See macro-trends, filter out noise.
index.long_term_desc: All Time. Aggregated line chart. The bird's-eye view of your lifting career.
index.reimagined_desc: Godmode combines cutting-edge AI technology with proven fitness science. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned athlete, our app adapts to you.
index.ready_desc: Join thousands who have transformed their fitness journey with Godmode. Download the app and experience the future of personal training.
index.privacy_desc: Learn how we protect your personal information and fitness data with industry-leading security.
index.terms_desc: Understand your rights and responsibilities when using the Godmode app and services.
index.support_desc: Have questions or need help? Our support team is here to assist you on your fitness journey.

contact.title: Contact | Godmode
contact.description: Contact Godmode - Get in touch with our team for support, feedback, or questions about our AI-powered fitness app.
contact.page_header_subtitle: Get in touch with our team for support and questions
contact.main_header_desc: We'd love to hear from you. Your input helps us improve and create a better fitness experience for everyone.
contact.get_in_touch_desc: For questions, suggestions, or feedback about Godmode, please reach out to us:
contact.faq_q1: How do I cancel my subscription?
contact.faq_a1: You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings in the app or by contacting our support team.
contact.faq_a2_p1: Yes, we take data security seriously. Read our
contact.faq_a2_p2: for detailed information about how we protect your data.
contact.faq_q3: Can I sync with other fitness apps?
contact.faq_a3: Currently, Godmode works as a standalone app. We're exploring integrations with popular fitness platforms for future updates.
contact.faq_a4: Refund policies depend on your platform (App Store/Google Play). Contact us for assistance with refund requests.
contact.bug_reports_desc: Encountered a problem with the app? Help us improve by reporting bugs or technical issues. Please include:
contact.bug_list_1: Device type and operating system version
contact.footer_msg: We're here to help you succeed.
